author: The Canadian Press
title: Canadian hospitals join fundraising efforts to close COVID-19 'gaps'
description: Canadian hospitals facing urgent COVID-19 needs are banding together to close funding "gaps" for their institutions and embattled health-care workers.
content:
Canadian hospitals facing urgent COVID-19 needs are banding together to close funding "gaps" for their institutions and embattled health-care workers.
Dubbed The Frontline Fund, the national campaign seeks donations on behalf of more than 100 institutions ac… [+3469 chars]
